channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hiring slows in December to end the weakest year of job growth since the pandemic
item.description: U.S. employers added 50,000 jobs in December, according to a report from the Labor Department Friday. Measured annually, job gains in 2025 were the sl...

item.title: Venezuela releases imprisoned opposition figures, which Trump says U.S. requested
item.description: Venezuela released a number of imprisoned high-profile opposition figures, activists and journalists, in what the government described as a gesture to...

item.title: Bill Gates Makes a Multibillion-Dollar Divorce Payout
item.description: The billionaire and philanthropist has made a nearly $8 billion payment to the private foundation of his ex-wife, Melinda French Gates, new tax filing...

item.title: E.U. and South America to Form Free-Trade Zone With 700 Million People
item.description: The agreement represents a push for deeper global cooperation, in contrast to the United States turning to coercion in its dealings with other countri...

item.title: Poll: Fewer Americans see U.S. as moral leader. And, FBI takes over ICE shooting case
item.description: Many Americans say the U.S. is not a moral leader but want it to be, according to an NPR/Ipsos poll. And, the FBI is taking over the investigation int...

item.title: National Park updates guidelines to stop visitors defacing Trump picture on pass
By Killing Renee Good, ICE Sent a Message to Us All
item.description: Not even citizens are safe in Trump’s America.

item.title: Yemen's Southern Transitional Council says it will dissolve after its head fled to UAE
item.description: Yemen's Southern Transitional Council and its institutions will be dismantled after weeks of unrest in southern areas and a day after its leader fled ...

item.title: Pope Leo Rebukes a Spreading Global ‘Zeal for War’
item.description: The pontiff used an annual address to ambassadors to the Vatican to condemn countries that prioritized violence over diplomacy to achieve their goals.

item.title: What Is the Oreshnik Ballistic Missile Russia Used in a Strike on Ukraine?
item.description: The attack was just the second time that Moscow had launched the nuclear-capable intermediate-range ballistic weapon.

item.title: Russia Says It Used Nuclear-Capable Missile to Strike Western Ukraine
item.description: The attack seemed intended to send a message to Europe as it strongly backs Kyiv in the peace talks.

item.title: Live Updates: U.S. Forces Board Another Tanker Carrying Venezuelan Oil
item.description: The tanker, the Olina, is the fifth such vessel boarded or seized by the U.S. in its campaign to control Venezuela’s oil exports.

item.title: Pope Leo Rebukes a Spreading Global ‘Zeal for War’
item.description: The pontiff used an annual address to ambassadors to the Vatican to condemn countries that prioritized violence over diplomacy to achieve their goals.

item.title: U.S. Boards Another Tanker Carrying Venezuelan Oil
item.description: The tanker, the Olina, is the fifth to be boarded or seized by U.S. forces in recent weeks as part of an effort to control Venezuela’s oil exports.
